    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>

    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>

          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_78494</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Repulsion of two hydrogen nuclei</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Abstossung von zwei Wasserstoffkernen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Répulsion de deux noyaux d'hydrogène</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Repulsion de dois núcleos do hidrogênio</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Una repulsione di due nuclei dell'idrogeno</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Απέχθεια δύο πυρήνων υδρογόνου</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Repulsión de dos núcleos del hidrógeno</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This diagram illustrates the increase of repulsion between two hydrogen nuclei when they are moved closer together due to Coulomb forces.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Coulomb forces</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">electric charges</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">hydrogen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">nuclei</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">repulsions</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses Diagramm veranschaulicht die Zunahme der 
Abstossung zwischen zwei Wasserstoffkernen, wenn sie an den 
Coulombkräften verschobenes nahe zusammen liegen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ce diagramme illustre l'augmentation de la 
répulsion entre deux noyaux d'hydrogène quand ils sont ensemble plus
étroitement déplacé dus aux forces de coulomb.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este diagrama ilustra o aumento de um repulsion 
entre dois núcleos do hidrogênio quando são  junto mais perto 
movido devido às forças do coulomb.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo schema illustra l'aumento della repulsione
fra due nuclei dell'idrogeno quando sono insieme più vicino spostato 
dovuto le forze di coulomb.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό το διάγραμμα επεξηγεί την αύξηση της απέχθειας 
μεταξύ δύο πυρήνων υδρογόνου όταν κινούνται πιό κοντά λόγω 
προς τις δυνάμεις Coulomb.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Este diagrama ilustra el aumento de la repulsión
entre dos núcleos del hidrógeno cuando son más cerca movido junto  
debido a las fuerzas del culombio.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Coulombkräfte</string>
          </keyword>
